getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.subtitle: We're here to help make your stay perfect. Contact us with any questions or to book your reservation.

bookingCta.title: Ready to Book Your Stay?
bookingCta.description: Visit our booking page to check availability and reserve your room at Panorama Resort.

map.title: Find Us
map.description: Located in the beautiful city of Elbasan, Panorama Resort offers easy access to local attractions while providing a peaceful retreat from the bustle of everyday life.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to our most commonly asked questions. If you don't see what you're looking for, please contact us.

questions.question: What are the check-in and check-out times?
questions.answer: Check-in time is 3:00 PM and check-out time is 11:00 AM. Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request, subject to availability.

questions.question: Is airport transportation available?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer airport transportation for an additional fee. Please provide your flight details at least 48 hours prior to arrival to arrange pickup.

questions.question: Are pets allowed at the resort?
questions.answer: We have designated pet-friendly rooms available. Please inform us at the time of booking if you plan to bring a pet. Additional fees and restrictions apply.

questions.question: Is Wi-Fi available at the resort?
questions.answer: Yes, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort, including all guest rooms and public areas.

questions.question: What dining options are available?
questions.answer: We have multiple dining options including our main restaurant, beach bar & grill, and fine dining restaurant. Room service is also available 24/7.

questions.question: Do you offer special packages or promotions?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer various seasonal packages and promotions. Please visit our website or contact our reservations team for current offers.
